 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造函数 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造函数 | 方法

org.biosino.CHS.image
类 GenoLocRendering

java.lang.Object
  org.biosino.CHS.image.GenoLocRendering

public class GenoLocRendering
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to render a GenoLoc object,which is an half part of a CHS rendering.

构造函数摘要
GenoLocRendering(GenoLoc genoLoc, java.awt.Graphics2D g2, double scale, double midLoc)
          Create a new GenoLocRendering object.
 
方法摘要
 void drawChr(double y, double labelDist)
          Draw the GenoLoc object using a horizontal line and label its name.
 void drawGeneLabels(Gene[] geneList, double geneY, double labelY, double theta)
          Draw gene labels.
 double[] drawGenes(Gene[] geneList, double y, double height)
          Draw genes located at the GenoLoc using rectangle.
 void drawScale(double y, double labelDist, double verticalLength)
          Draw the scale ruler of the GenoLoc and label it.
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

构造函数详细信息

GenoLocRendering

public GenoLocRendering(GenoLoc genoLoc,
                        java.awt.Graphics2D g2,
                        double scale,
                        double midLoc)
Create a new GenoLocRendering object.

参数：
genoLoc - the GenoLoc object to be rendered
g2 - a Gaphics2D object representing the graphic device
scale - the proportion of image coordinates relative to chromosome coordinates
midLoc - the image location of the middle point of the GenoLoc
方法详细信息

drawChr

public void drawChr(double y,
                    double labelDist)
Draw the GenoLoc object using a horizontal line and label its name. See: 
    
          Chr label   ---------------------------

参数：
y - the vertical location (in y axes) of the GenoLoc in the image
labelDist - the x distance between the start ponit of the GenoLoc and its label

drawScale

public void drawScale(double y,
                      double labelDist,
                      double verticalLength)
Draw the scale ruler of the GenoLoc and label it. See: 
          50          51           52         53  Mb     (scale labels)
          |-----------|------------|----------|          (scale ruler and vertical lines)

参数：
y - the y location of the scale in the image
labelDist - the y distance between the scale and its labels
verticalLength - the length of vertical lines on the scale ruler

drawGenes

public double[] drawGenes(Gene[] geneList,
                          double y,
                          double height)
Draw genes located at the GenoLoc using rectangle.

参数：
geneList - the gene list
y - the y location of the genes (rectangles) in the image
height - the height of the genes (rectangles) in the image
返回：
the x locations of the genes (rectangles)

drawGeneLabels

public void drawGeneLabels(Gene[] geneList,
                           double geneY,
                           double labelY,
                           double theta)
Draw gene labels. See: 
               gene label
                 |
          -------|-------------------------  (chromosome and genes)

参数：
geneList - the gene list, which needs to be sorted according to their start points in ascendent order
geneY - y location of genes
labelY - y location of labels
theta - the angle to rotate the labels
